content: knit a fast-and-easy cowl in a 3x2 rib in the round on a 16 circular knitting needle with a bulky weight yarn the uneven rib stitch gives a different look to the cowl when it is worn folded down around the neck it will dress up a coat dress or top and help you stay warm at the same time the sample was made with one skein of lion brand wool-ease tonal 124 yds with a size 11 8 mm 16 knitting needle finished size of the cowl is 8 tall x 22 around unblocked the pattern also includes instructions for using a worsted or aran weight yarn you can use any weight of yarn with a knitting needle size that works for that yarn and/or by changing the number of stitches you cast on for the desired size cowl this design is a joint effort with jamie roe roeofpurls enjoy
